Reviews.Title: amazing for a first timer
Reviews.Author: family_man85
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my wife for christmas. when it got here, it came nicely packaged and it new condition. i automatically got it out and played with it. i dont have internet access at home currently, so i couldnt test that yet. but for this tablet being our first, i am amazed at how nice and advanced it is. very responsive, only have to tap an icon once and it is fast to bring it up, and the camera is pretty good for the resolution that was advertized. i bought this specific tablet because of other reviews on the same item being sold by other sellers, but i wanted to be the first to write a review so i accurately reviewed the right item. i am very pleased, so far, with my purchase and cant wait to see my wife open it on christmas morning. if anything comes up, i will update this review for all to see.

Reviews.Title: screen is weak
Reviews.Author: ryaneaux8
Reviews.Content: The device works great except the screen cracked three days after delivery. I'm currently unavailable to find a replacement screen. There are not enough vendors. One of them already ripped me off for 30 bucks. Help with parts would be nice.

Reviews.Title: FOR THE PRICE THERE IS NONE BETTER
Reviews.Author: padua
Reviews.Content: ONLY THE WIFI  IS WEAK OTHERWISE PERFECT. PLAYING APPS ON IT IS REALLY GOOD .WORTH BUYING WOULD BUY AGAIN ...GOOD

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming but nothing else
Reviews.Author: kerstie
Reviews.Content: This tablet was great for playing games. Getting the games to download, however, was a different story. The play store ran very, very slowly, and downloads were very slow. Also, trying to get onto the internet, facebook, or pinterest was nearly impossible. Every time I try to use the internet, it either runs as slow as molasses, or it pops up and says "not responding, please close". I finally gave up on ever trying to do anything on it, other than playing bejeweled. I finally have contacted the seller to request returning the item and receiving a refund. Waiting for their response.

Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: christian
Reviews.Content: I bought this device to gift it to my niece in Mexico and within a couple of days the tablet stopped working. It would not turn on and is currently sitting in a bureau collecting dust.Do not recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: fidel hernandez
Reviews.Content: this tablet is super i love the model even the name of it the graphics and how many apps i can play on the table.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: TRUDY
Reviews.Content: I don't like the way the charger connects to the tablet and the batterie doesn't stay charged maybe half hour.

Reviews.Title: It's OK as a low cost slow and quirky tablet
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cartelli
Reviews.Content: I returned it. Had some problems with setup. Was too slow for my taste. It is low cost, but I don't think it is worth the savings.
